api_list.name: Get individual News source News
api_list.description: Get news about Pep Guardiola from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://guardiola-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news/times"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "guardiola-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://guardiola-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "guardiola-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Pep's news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Pep Guardiola
